net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_mergeChildren
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Merges the children expressions rolls already attached to the parent expression back into the parent. A child's allTotal is added to each parent's totals element. This makes the child's totalRoll and diceRolled effectively equivalent and thus callers should avoid creating confusion by adding children with a totalRoll > 1.
arg (0) = rollExpression (with at least 1 child expression, already rolled)
Returns rollExpression (with totals and rollString updated with children roll results)
